title: 庆祝一下。。。。（妈妈说标题长才行）
author: kukushuaige001
txt_content:
好久没出来混了。。
所以发个水贴
庆祝一下很凑巧的事情。。比如[attach]20305[/attach]在线时间222小时。。突然才发现在论坛这么久了

[diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem]
还有就是。。回帖数333个。。在线小时222.。。表示巧合啊。。
